app.title: CSGIRLIES
app.subtitle: Adopt a magical companion that learns with you, motivates you, and celebrates your success.

auth.loginSubtitle: Find your companion and continue your progress.
auth.signupSubtitle: In a few seconds, adopt your magical baby animal.
auth.passwordHint: No need for a perfect password, this is a prototype üíú
auth.switchToLogin: Already have a companion? Log in
auth.signOutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?

onboarding.title: Create your legendary duo ‚ú®
onboarding.subtitle: In a few steps, you adopt a magical baby animal that will study, play, and grow with you.
onboarding.step1Subtitle: What should your companion call you?
onboarding.step2Subtitle: Which one resembles you the most for learning?
onboarding.step3Subtitle: Which color motivates you the most to work?
onboarding.step4Subtitle: A cute, funny, or badass name - your choice ‚ú®
onboarding.nameHint: This is how your companion will call you.
onboarding.adoptHint: You can always adopt others later in the full version.
onboarding.noSupabase: Supabase not configured. Profile cannot be saved.
onboarding.noUser: No authenticated user found. Please log in again.
onboarding.profileSaveFailed: Failed to save profile. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Your Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Your companion is here, waiting to learn with you.
dashboard.companionDescription: {{name}} evolves based on your XP and sends you little messages.
dashboard.todaySessionDescription: Choose how you want to learn today. Your companion will follow your pace.
dashboard.tip: Tip: a pomodoro session + a quiz at the end = lots of XP for {{name}} ‚ú®
dashboard.adultReached: Adult level reached ‚Äì your companion has reached maximum age.
dashboard.notEnoughXP: You don't have enough XP! (Required: {{cost}} XP)

learning.title: Learning Session
learning.subtitle: Focus together for 25 minutes, then your companion will quiz you to verify everything is well understood.
learning.prepareSubtitle: Describe what you'll study. The final quiz will use this context.
learning.topicPlaceholder: Ex: Chapter on linear functions, or copy an excerpt from your course
learning.pomodoroMode: Use Pomodoro mode (25 min focus / 5 min break)
learning.focusSubtitle: When time is up, you automatically move to a quiz.
learning.companionWatching: Your companion is watching you work
learning.companionSubtitle: {{name}} observes your progress and encourages you throughout the session.
learning.uploadSubtitle: You can send a PDF / DOCX / image, it will be divided into small chunks so AI can create quizzes and more accurate study plans.
learning.planSubtitle: Tell us how many minutes you have today and AI creates a Pomodoro schedule + quizzes from your documents.
learning.planMinTime: Give at least 10 minutes to create a real plan.
learning.planFailed: Unable to generate a plan right now.
learning.focusEndTask3: Note what you need to review in the next cycle
learning.focusEndCompletionMessage: You completed a 25-minute session! Earned {{xp}} XP for {{name}}. Time to test your knowledge!
learning.planMoreCycles: (... more cycles are available in the raw response)

quiz.title: AI Quiz
quiz.subtitle: Your companion creates questions adapted to your level to help you progress.
quiz.whatLearn: What do you want to learn today?
quiz.topicPlaceholder: Ex: Linear equations, French revolution, photosynthesis...
quiz.question: Question {{current}} of {{total}}
quiz.companionMessage: {{name}} is proud of you! Keep learning! ‚ú®
quiz.wolframHistorySubtitle: Results and explanations returned by Wolfram Alpha for your questions.
quiz.quizCompletionMessage: Quiz completed! You earned {{score}} XP for your companion. Keep it up! üéâ

analytics.title: Your Learning Analytics
analytics.excellentMessage: You're doing great! Keep up the excellent work! üåü
analytics.goodMessage: Making good progress! A bit more practice will get you to the next level.
analytics.improvementMessage: Every expert was once a beginner! Keep practicing and you'll see improvement soon! üí™
analytics.recommendation1: Try a Mathematics quiz to strengthen your geometry skills
analytics.recommendation2: Review Science topics - your performance could improve
analytics.recommendation3: Consider increasing your daily study goal to 35 minutes
analytics.recommendation4: Complete your learning streak - one more day to go!

animal.levelBaby: We're still babies, getting our bearings.
animal.levelAdolescent: We're growing well, keep it up!
animal.levelAdult: Wow, adult level! We're becoming legends.
contextDashboard: Ready to learn something new today?
I believe in you! Let's study together! ‚ú®
Every step forward is a victory!
contextLearning: I'm here with you, stay strong!
contextBreak: Move around a bit, it helps!

streaks.title: Hydration Streaks
streaks.subtitle: Keep your companion hydrated by learning every day!
streaks.epic: Epic hydration! Your companion is thriving! üåü
streaks.legendary: Legendary caregiver! Your companion is forever grateful! üëë
streaks.getStarted: Start learning to hydrate your companion today!

quizThemes.title: Quiz Themes ‚ú®
quizThemes.subtitle: Choose a theme and difficulty level to start your educational quiz.
quizThemes.selectQuiz: Select the quiz you want to take

wolfram.title: Teacher Companion (Wolfram) ‚ú®
wolfram.subtitle: Choose a Wolfram Language theme, describe what you want to do, and let your companion query Wolfram for you.
wolfram.step1Subtitle: Themes correspond to the major families of Wolfram documentation (data, visualization, machine learning, geography, etc.).
wolfram.step2Subtitle: You can stay in English, the companion will try to formulate an appropriate Wolfram query. You can also write a Wolfram query directly in the following field if you already know it.
wolfram.taskPlaceholder: Ex: calculate the solution to an equation, compare populations, plot a curve, explain a phenomenon...
wolfram.detailsPlaceholder: Ex: equation x^2 - 5x + 6 = 0, plot interval, countries to compare, etc.
wolfram.inputPlaceholder: Ex: solve x^2 - 5x + 6 = 0, explain photosynthesis, population of France vs Germany...
wolfram.inputHelper: If you fill this field, this query will be sent directly to Wolfram.
wolfram.resultSubtitle: Here's what Wolfram Alpha returns for your query.

landing.heroSubtitle: A magical fox or cute puppy that grows with your XP and streaks, turning revisions into a kawaii adventure.
landing.feature1Desc: AI-powered quizzes and study guides adapted just for you.
landing.feature2Desc: Watch your virtual animal grow and evolve with your progress.
landing.feature3Desc: Earn XP, maintain streaks and rewards while making learning fun.
landing.ctaTitle: Ready to Start Your Learning Adventure?
landing.ctaDesc: Join thousands of students who have made studying fun and gratifying.
